translation.en: [man] "Koh amar," Evan.
translation.zh: 是“阿玛尔” 埃文

translation.en: -Sorry. One second, sorry. -[chanting stops]
translation.zh: 抱歉 稍等一下

translation.en: Hello. Yeah.
translation.zh: 你好 是

translation.en: Yeah, hold on. It's God. He wants his language back.
translation.zh: 是 先别挂 上帝打来的 他想把他的语言要回去

translation.en: I'm sorry, Rabbi. I can't focus.
translation.zh: 对不起 拉比 我真没办法集中精神

translation.en: I feel like my whole life is a dumpster fire, and I'm only 12.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己这辈子就是一场灾难 我才12岁啊

translation.en: I don't even have a whole life yet.
translation.zh: 都还不能说“这辈子”吧

translation.en: I get it. No, it's rough. It's rough when your folks get divorced.
translation.zh: 我理解的 是啊 父母离婚确实是挺艰难的

translation.en: My mom went around the apartment cutting my dad's head out of all the photos.
translation.zh: 我妈在公寓里到处找照片 把我爸的脑袋从每一张里剪出去

translation.en: -No! -With her teeth.
translation.zh: -不是吧 -用牙齿咬的

translation.en: [chuckles] Hey, we'll get through it all.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们能挺过去的

translation.en: We'll study remotely. Bring your books to Indiana. It'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我们可以远程学习 把你的书都带到印第安纳去 没事的

translation.en: A Bar Mitzvah is the event that defines you.
translation.zh: 受诫礼可是定义你的大事件

translation.en: -The Jewish Super Bowl. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 是犹太人的超级碗

translation.en: What kind of killer party can I have in Indiana?
translation.zh: 我在印第安纳哪可能 办出什么像样的派对啊？

translation.en: -[door opens] -I don't even know anyone there.
translation.zh: 我在那儿谁都不认识

translation.en: [breathless] Hi, Rabbi Shapiro.
translation.zh: 嗨 夏皮罗拉比

translation.en: Jessica.
translation.zh: 杰茜卡

translation.en: -Evan tells me you're doing well. -[Jessica] Oh yeah.
translation.zh: -埃文跟我说你近来挺不错的 -可不是吗

translation.en: The weather's great at rock bottom.
translation.zh: 人生谷底的天气可棒了

translation.en: -Kidding. -She's not kidding.
translation.zh: -开个玩笑 -她不是在开玩笑

translation.en: [quietly] I'm not kidding.
translation.zh: 我不是在开玩笑

translation.en: -Hey. We'll chat when you get there, okay? -Mm-hm. High five.
translation.zh: 嘿 到了那边后我们再聊好吗？ 来击掌

translation.en: It's gonna be a long drive,
translation.zh: 这一路要开好久的车呢

translation.en: but Grandma is so excited that we're coming.
translation.zh: 但外婆很激动我们要过去

translation.en: She's FaceTiming every five minutes.
translation.zh: 每五分钟就要拉我们视频一次

translation.en: At least I think it's her. All I see is neck.
translation.zh: 至少我觉得应该是她 因为我就只能看到个脖子

translation.en: That's me, Evan Goldman.
translation.zh: 这就是我 埃文·高德曼

translation.en: And I live at 224 West 92nd Street in the heart of New York City.
translation.zh: 我住在西92街224号 纽约的市中心

translation.en: I'm about to turn 13 and have my Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 我马上就要13岁了 即将举行我的受诫礼

translation.en: It was gonna be the biggest party. My whole class was coming.
translation.zh: 原本这将是一场盛大的派对 全班同学都会到场

translation.en: Everything was going so well.
translation.zh: 一切都顺顺利利的

translation.en: We had a happy family.
translation.zh: 我们有一个幸福的家庭

translation.en: Until my dad met someone else, and my parents broke up.
translation.zh: 直到我爸遇见了别人 然后我的父母就分开了

translation.en: ♪ Picture me Just another cool kid ♪
translation.zh: 试想一下 我一个受欢迎的酷小子

translation.en: ♪ In NYC Near the park and the Met ♪
translation.zh: 住纽约市 公园与大都会两步就到

translation.en: ♪ Got my crew Everything was great ♪
translation.zh: 伙伴一大票 生活很美妙

translation.en: ♪ And I never knew Just how bad it would get ♪
translation.zh: 我可没想到 情况能变得如此糟糕

translation.en: ♪ Who'd have guessed Dad would ruin everything? ♪
translation.zh: 有谁能预料 老爸会将一切全毁掉

translation.en: ♪ Mom's depressed And her lawyers are mean ♪
translation.zh: 妈妈变抑郁 她的律师们也超级凶

translation.en: ♪ Now I'm stressed Life is a disaster ♪
translation.zh: 这下好焦虑 生活成了一场灾难

translation.en: ♪ And I'm cracking from the strain Going totally insane ♪
translation.zh: 压力让我难绷 眼看着要发疯

translation.en: ♪ And I'm just about to turn Just about to turn, just about to turn ♪
translation.zh: 而我马上就要 马上就要 马上就要…

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: 十三岁了！

translation.en: ♪ Everything switches ♪
translation.zh: 一切都变了样

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Everything turns around ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -天旋又地转

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ End up in stitches ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -碰了一身伤

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Hide away underground ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -挖个洞躲藏

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: 十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ Can I get through it? ♪
translation.zh: 我能否挺过去？

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Life'll change overnight ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -生活一夜改变

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ How do I do it? ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -我应该怎么做？

translation.en: -♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Nothing is going right ♪
translation.zh: -十三岁！ -对的事没一件

translation.en: ♪ The best and the worst And the most and the least ♪
translation.zh: 最好的与最坏的 最多的与最少的

translation.en: ♪ And the crazy and the scary And I'm standing on the edge! ♪
translation.zh: 疯狂的与可怕的 我正站在崩溃的边缘！

translation.en: [man] Hey, Evan.
translation.zh: 嘿 埃文

translation.en: Here's your stuff from the house.
translation.zh: 你落在家里的东西

translation.en: You okay, kiddo?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 孩子？

translation.en: I want to stay here. In my school. With my friends.
translation.zh: 我想留在这里 留在我的学校里 跟朋友们在一起

translation.en: Like, are we even still a family?
translation.zh: 我们现在到底还算不算一家人吗？

translation.en: Of course we are.
translation.zh: 当然算

translation.en: And we are working it all out.
translation.zh: 我们已经在想办法解决了

translation.en: It is going to be great.
translation.zh: 一定会很棒的

translation.en: Great.
Know what would've been great?
translation.zh: 本来是很棒的

translation.en: If you didn't blow everything up and ruin my life!
translation.zh: 可你却搞砸了一切 毁掉了我生活！

translation.en: Evan!
translation.zh: 埃文！

translation.en: ♪ Twelve years old Everything that used to be ♪
translation.zh: 十二岁时 曾经拥有的那段

translation.en: ♪ Good as gold Starts to crumble and crack ♪
translation.zh: 美好日子 分崩离析正开始

translation.en: ♪ Pressure mounts Once it was a joke ♪
translation.zh: 压力在加大 曾经的一个玩笑

translation.en: ♪ Now it really counts And there's no turning back ♪
translation.zh: 如今已成真 过去再也回不了

translation.en: -♪ Life goes wrong ♪ -♪ Suddenly they're yelling ♪
translation.zh: -生活出意外 -突然他们吼起来

translation.en: ♪ That your hair's too long Or your room isn't clean ♪
translation.zh: 不是说你头发太长 就是你的房间太脏

translation.en: -♪ Roll along ♪ -♪ Every conversation ♪ ♪ Is another lost cause ♪
translation.zh: -一路滑过去 -每段对话不是没希望的徒劳

translation.en: ♪ Or a list of my flaws And I'm just about to turn ♪
translation.zh: 就是细数我缺陷的列表 而我马上就要

translation.en: ♪ Just about to turn God, I'm gonna turn 13! ♪
translation.zh: 马上就要 天啊 我要十三岁了！

translation.en: -♪ What am I doing? ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -我在干什么？ -十三岁！

translation.en: -♪ Who am I gonna be? ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -我将成什么样？ -十三岁！

translation.en: -♪ Somebody listen ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -来个人听我说 -十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ Somebody talk to me ♪
translation.zh: 来个人跟我讲

translation.en: ♪ Why is my life a complete disaster? How did things get so far off track? ♪
translation.zh: 为何我的生活成了一场大灾难？ 一切是如何偏离了正轨？

translation.en: ♪ How can I not go to Indiana? How do I get my family back? ♪
translation.zh: 我要怎样才不用去印第安纳？ 要怎样才能找回我的家？

translation.en: ♪ I wanna fly, wanna run, wanna drive Wanna get rich, wanna get mad ♪
translation.zh: 我想飞翔 想开车 想奔跑 想发财 想发怒 想要逃

translation.en: ♪ Wanna get out, wanna get my braces off Wanna get my nose pierced ♪
translation.zh: 想发财 想发怒 想要逃 想打个鼻钉 想把我的牙套脱掉

translation.en: ♪ Wanna grow my hair long But all I keep hearing is ♪
translation.zh: 想把头发养长 可我整天听到的话却是

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh: 不 你还没准备好！ 不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh: 不 现在就做不太好！ 等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh: 不 你还没准备好！ 不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh: 不 现在就做不太好！ 等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh: 不 你还没准备好！ 不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh: 不 现在就做不太好！ 等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ Homework! Laundry! Dishes! Courses! ♪
translation.zh: 回家作业！洗衣服！ 洗碗碟！课外班！

translation.en: ♪ Just settle down and hold your horses! ♪
translation.zh: 别着急 慢慢来！

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 你在想什么呐？

translation.en: You scared me. You can't just run away.
translation.zh: 把我给吓的呀 你不能就这样逃跑吧

translation.en: Isn't that what you're doing?
translation.zh: 这不正是你在做的事吗？

translation.en: No! That's… It's different.
translation.zh: 不是！我在做…那可不一样

translation.en: -Evan. Honey. -[Evan] I know, Mom.
translation.zh: -埃文 亲爱的 -我知道了 妈妈

translation.en: "We'll get through it. It'll be fine. You'll make new friends."
translation.zh: “我们会挺过去的 没事的 你会交到新朋友的”

translation.en: I just wanted to make sure you went to the bathroom before we left.
translation.zh: 我只是想问一下 你要不要在我们出发前先上个厕所

translation.en: Oh, I-- I'm good.
translation.zh: 噢 不用了

translation.en: Good, but all that other stuff too.
translation.zh: 好 当然还有你刚才说的那些

translation.en: Mom, I hate this.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我恨现在这样

translation.en: And I hate that Dad met someone else.
translation.zh: 我恨爸爸遇见了别人

translation.en: I know, kiddo. Me too.
translation.zh: 我明白 孩子 我也是

translation.en: We'll get through this.
translation.zh: 我们会挺过去的

translation.en: ♪ Just about to turn Just about to turn ♪
translation.zh: 马上就要 马上就要

translation.en: ♪ Just about to turn Just about to turn 13! ♪
translation.zh: 马上就要 马上就要十三岁了！

translation.en: -♪ Something is coming ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -有什么要来到 -十三岁！

translation.en: -♪ Something is blowing up ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -有什么要引爆 -十三岁！

translation.en: -♪ Something is humming ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -有什么嗡嗡响 -十三岁！

translation.en: -♪ Somebody's growing up ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: -有谁正在成长 -十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: 十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: 十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
translation.zh: 十三岁！

translation.en: ♪ The best and the worst And the most and the least ♪
translation.zh: 最好的与最坏的 最多的与最少的

translation.en: ♪ And the crazy and the scary And we're just about to turn 13! ♪
translation.zh: 疯狂的与可怕的 而我们马上要十三岁了！

translation.en: Oh! Look at that stunning sunset.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这迷人的落日

translation.en: No buildings. No smog. No stress.
translation.zh: 没有高楼 没有雾霾 没有压力

translation.en: No people. Literally no people.
translation.zh: 也没有人 真的连一个人都没有

translation.en: Thank God. I was so worried.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 我都担心死了

translation.en: How was that drive?
translation.zh: 这一路上还顺利吗？

translation.en: Oh. You look terrible.
translation.zh: 我看起来好憔悴啊

translation.en: What? Hug your mother already.
translation.zh: 怎么了？赶紧来抱抱你妈呀

translation.en: I'm okay, Mom.
translation.zh: 我没事 妈妈

translation.en: You're not. A mother knows.
translation.zh: 你有事 做妈妈的能看出来

translation.en: Evan. Evan! [laughs]
translation.zh: 埃文 埃文呀！

translation.en: Hi, Grandma.
translation.zh: 嗨 外婆

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么啦？

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: You're not. A grandma knows. Come on.
translation.zh: 你有事 做外婆的能看出来 快进来吧

translation.en: Wow, this place looks exactly the same.
translation.zh: 哇 这里看上去真是一点也没变

translation.en: [Grandma] I'm surprised you remember.
translation.zh: 没想到你还记得呀

translation.en: You haven't been here since you were five,
translation.zh: 你五岁之后就再也没来过了

translation.en: but if it took a divorce to get you to come back, maybe it's a good thing.
translation.zh: 但如果要离次婚才能让你回来 兴许还是件好事呢

translation.en: -Mom! -What? I look at the bright side.
translation.zh: -妈妈！ -怎么啦？我爱往好的一面看嘛

translation.en: -Come on, I'll show you your room. -[Evan] All righty.
translation.zh: -来吧 我带你看看房间 -好嘞

translation.en: -[Grandma] I'll take the bag. -[Evan] Okay.
translation.zh: 我来拿包

translation.en: [Grandma] Oh my God, it's heavy. What do you have in here, rocks?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 好重 你这里面都装了些什么啊 石头吗？

translation.en: Your room.
translation.zh: 你的房间

translation.en: Was this my mom's room?
translation.zh: 这是我妈以前的房间吗？

translation.en: [Grandma] Yes, it was, but I've been using it as a yoga studio,
translation.zh: 对 曾经是 但我后来就一直把它当做瑜伽室在用

translation.en: so that might be what you smell. Sorry.
translation.zh: 所以你闻到的味道 可能是因为这个 抱歉

translation.en: Evan.
translation.zh: 埃文

translation.en: I know you'll miss your friends
translation.zh: 我知道你会想念你的朋友们

translation.en: and school and bagels.
translation.zh: 还有学校 还有贝果

translation.en: But give it a chance.
translation.zh: 但给这里一个机会吧

translation.en: When your grandfather brought me here, I didn't think I'd ever get used to it.
translation.zh: 当年你外公把我带过来时 我心想我是一辈子都不会适应这里的

translation.en: But 50 years later, he's dead,
translation.zh: 可50年后 他是死了

translation.en: and I'm still here buying my bras, eggs, and tires all in one store.
translation.zh: 我却依旧在这里 去同一家店里买胸罩、鸡蛋和轮胎

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: And not just because I have to.
translation.zh: 而且不仅是因为我是你外婆

translation.en: [sighs] This entire year has been lawyers and therapists and… carbs,
translation.zh: 这一整年都在穿梭于律师啊 心理医生啊还有… 碳水之间

translation.en: and every mom on the Upper West Side asking, "How are you?"
translation.zh: 而且上西区的每个妈妈都在问： “你还好吗？”

translation.en: [sighs] I needed out.
translation.zh: 我必须要离开

translation.en: [Grandma] So you're out.
translation.zh: 是啊 你离开了

translation.en: Now you can start over. Do whatever you want.
translation.zh: 这下你就能重头开始 做任何你想做的事了

translation.en: You could finally write again, huh?
translation.zh: 你终于可以重新开始写作了吧？

translation.en: Mom. Give me a little time, okay?
translation.zh: 妈 再给我点时间 好吗？

translation.en: Take all the time you need. Who am I to judge?
translation.zh: 你尽管慢慢来 我有什么资格说三道四？

translation.en: But, ticktock.
translation.zh: 但是啊 滴答滴答

translation.en: I'm just saying.
translation.zh: 我只是说说而已

translation.en: How can anyone sleep with all this quiet?
translation.zh: 这么安静 谁能睡得着啊？

translation.en: Good morning, honey. Put away your video game.
translation.zh: 早上好 亲爱的 把游戏放下

translation.en: [Grandma] So, Evan,
translation.zh: 对了 埃文

translation.en: I was thinking about your Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 我在想该怎么给你办受诫礼

translation.en: Okay, just curious.
translation.zh: 好吧 我只是好奇一问

translation.en: How many other Jews are there in Walkerton?
translation.zh: 沃克顿能有几个犹太人啊？

translation.en: If you include us?
translation.zh: 如算上我们的话？

translation.en: Us.
translation.zh: 就我们

translation.en: Is there a temple?
translation.zh: 这里有庙吗？

translation.en: There is. It's called a church.
translation.zh: 有啊 只不过在这儿叫教堂

translation.en: So we'll do the party in the backyard.
translation.zh: 这样 我们就在后院里办派对

translation.en: Oh, and I've got a boom box. You can make me a mixtape.
translation.zh: 噢 我正好有个手提大音箱 你可以帮我录盘混音带

translation.en: What's a mixtape?
translation.zh: 混音带是什么东西啊？

translation.en: Also, I'm new here.
translation.zh: 而且 我才刚到这里

translation.en: If my party is awful, I'll never live it down.
translation.zh: 如果我的派对办得很糟 大家肯定忘不了

translation.en: I know it's important. We will make it good, I promise.
translation.zh: 我明白这件事很重要 我们一定会办好的 我保证

translation.en: It needs to be better than good.
translation.zh: 光“好”还远远不够

translation.en: Okay. Tell you what. I'll plan it.
translation.zh: 好吧 要不这样 我来策划

translation.en: -You'll plan it? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你来策划？ -对

translation.en: -You? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你？ -对

translation.en: -[Jessica] Really? -[Evan] Yes, really.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -对 真的

translation.en: So it can be everything that I want.
translation.zh: 这样才能确保一切都是我想要的样子

translation.en: -Fine. -Good.
translation.zh: -行啊 -好啊

translation.en: -Good. -Good.
translation.zh: -好啊 -好啊

translation.en: -See? -[door opens] This is family.
translation.zh: 看到没？这才是一家人嘛

translation.en: [girl] Miss Ruth!
translation.zh: 露丝小姐！

translation.en: -Am I interrupting? -[all] No!
translation.zh: -打扰你们l吗？ -没有！

translation.en: Uh, hi, Miss Ruth.
translation.zh: 嗨 露丝小姐

translation.en: Patrice. Perfect.
translation.zh: 帕特里斯 来得正好

translation.en: This is my daughter, Jessica.
translation.zh: 这是我女儿 杰茜卡

translation.en: And I know it's been a while, but you and Evan remember each other, yes?
translation.zh: 我知道已经过了好久 但你和埃文还记得对方的 是吧？

translation.en: -[Evan] No. -[Patrice] Not really.
translation.zh: -没印象 -不太记得

translation.en: Miss Ruth, I came by to return your book.
translation.zh: -我是来还书的 -谢谢

translation.en: The Bell Jar.
translation.zh: 《钟形罩》

translation.en: Oh, this book made me wanna be a writer.
translation.zh: 就是这本书让我想当作家的

translation.en: Isn't it a little sad?
translation.zh: 这本书不是挺悲伤的吗？

translation.en: What's sad is you're the only one around here who knew it was sad.
translation.zh: 真正悲伤的是 这里只有你一个人知道这本书悲伤

translation.en: -Patrice, maybe you can show Evan around. -[Patrice] Sure.
translation.zh: -帕特里斯 要不你带埃文四处转转？ -好啊

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 棒极了

translation.en: -Wanna take some toast? -[Evan] I'm good.
translation.zh: -要拿点吐司去吗？ -不用了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -That's a cool shirt. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -衬衫挺酷的 -谢谢

translation.en: I try to warn people here that they're destroying our wildlife with landfills.
translation.zh: 我努力警告这里的人们 垃圾填埋场正在毁灭我们的野生动物

translation.en: -And how's that going? -Landfills are part of the tour.
translation.zh: -效果怎么样啊？ -垃圾填埋场是这里的景点之一

translation.en: Patrice! Patrice!
translation.zh: 帕特里斯！

translation.en: -Is that Evan? -Yeah. Evan, this is Archie.
translation.zh: -这是埃文吗？ -是啊 埃文 这位是阿奇

translation.en: -Hey, Archie. -[Archie] I know what you're thinking.
translation.zh: -嘿 阿奇 -我知道你在想什么

translation.en: Yep, I'm faking it.
translation.zh: 没错 我是假装的

translation.en: I'm gonna show Evan around.
translation.zh: 我带埃文四处转转

translation.en: This is around. Let me know if you run into Kendra.
translation.zh: 到这儿算转完了吧 要是遇上了肯德拉一定告诉我啊

translation.en: -Wait, who's Kendra? -An angel walking amongst us mere mortals.
translation.zh: -等等 肯德拉是谁？ -一位行走在我等凡人中的天使

translation.en: -Cool. I can't wait to meet her. -[Patrice laughs]
translation.zh: 酷 我等不及要见见她呢

translation.en: I'm not planning on running into Kendra. We'll see you later.
translation.zh: 我可没打算碰见肯德拉 回头见啦

translation.en: [Archie] Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll be here.
translation.zh: 就让我待在这儿

translation.en: [dramatically] Alone.
translation.zh: 孤身一人

translation.en: The one child left behind.
translation.zh: 被丢下的那个haizi

translation.en: -Don't fall for it. -See you later, Archie!
translation.zh: -别上当 -回头见 阿奇！

translation.en: [Archie] Welcome to Walkerton.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到沃克顿

translation.en: If someone offers to pray for you, let them.
translation.zh: 如果有人提出要为你祈祷就让他们吧

translation.en: -So what is there to do around here? -Not much.
translation.zh: -那么 你们这儿都有些什么活动啊？ -不多

translation.en: Yesterday I finished YouTube.
translation.zh: 我昨天刚把YouTube看完

translation.en: It's not nearly as exciting as your life in New York.
translation.zh: 肯定没有你在纽约的生活刺激啊

translation.en: Exciting, right.
translation.zh: 刺激 对

translation.en: My dad gets a midlife crisis, and I get mid-America.
translation.zh: 我爸遇上了中年危机 我却来到了美国中部

translation.en: Now I have to have my Bar Mitzvah in Walkerton, Indiana.
translation.zh: 这下我要在印第安那州沃克顿 办我的受诫礼了

translation.en: For us Jews, it's the one day that's supposed to be happy and perfect.
translation.zh: 对我们犹太人来说 这天应该是快乐的 完美的

translation.en: See, Catholics don't have that day.
translation.zh: 天主教徒们可没有这样的一天

translation.en: It would go against everything we believe in.
translation.zh: 这与我们所信仰的一切背道而驰

translation.en: [Evan] Back home, your party defines you.
translation.zh: 在我家那儿 你的派对能定义你

translation.en: Hey, you help with my petition to phase out single-use plastic,
translation.zh: 嘿 你帮我搞 逐步淘汰一次性塑料的请愿活动

translation.en: and I'll help you plan your party.
translation.zh: 我就来帮你策划你的派对

translation.en: Deal. And I'll make that my Mitzvah project.
translation.zh: 成交 我就把这当做我的善行项目

translation.en: Your what?
translation.zh: 你的什么？

translation.en: When you have a Bar Mitzvah,
translation.zh: 这样的 当你要办受诫礼时

translation.en: you get to pick a charity project that helps others.
translation.zh: 你有机会选一个帮助他人的慈善项目

translation.en: This is all working out.
translation.zh: 开始有眉目了

translation.en: We'll find the best DJ at the best ballroom at the best hotel.
translation.zh: 我们要找最好的DJ和最好的酒店 在最好的舞厅里办

translation.en: -Which is the Best Western. -What?
translation.zh: -那就是最佳西方酒店咯 -什么？

translation.en: Okay, where to start?
translation.zh: 好了 从哪儿开始呢？

translation.en: ♪ Down the road, there's a Dairy Queen Up the block, there's a Walmart ♪
translation.zh: 沿路走下去 是冰雪皇后一家 这方向上去 还有一间沃尔玛

translation.en: ♪ There's a place You can accessorize your pets ♪
translation.zh: 还有个给你宠物买东西的地方

translation.en: ♪ A school, a tree, a couple of churches And no matter how hard anybody searches ♪
translation.zh: 一棵树、几间教堂、一所学校 无论是派谁来仔细寻找

translation.en: ♪ That's about as thrilling As this dumbest village gets ♪
translation.zh: 这个傻村庄也就这么点花样

translation.en: ♪ It's the lamest place in the world ♪ ♪ But it just got a little bit better ♪
translation.zh: 这里是全世界最蹩脚的地方 但它刚变好了一些些

translation.en: ♪ So don't disappear ♪
translation.zh: 所以请别消失不见

translation.en: ♪ It's the lamest place in the world ♪
translation.zh: 这里是全世界最蹩脚的地方

translation.en: ♪ But I'm pretty sure It's not as lame as it was before ♪
translation.zh: 但我很确信它至少有好过从前

translation.en: ♪ Now that you're here ♪
translation.zh: 毕竟现在你来了

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you the hillside where everyone waits for the resurrection.
translation.zh: 快来吧 我带你去看 大家等耶稣复活的那个山坡

translation.en: And tomorrow, I can show you the haunted barn.
translation.zh: 明天呢 我带你去看一个闹鬼的谷仓

translation.en: ♪ Forty miles to the nearest river Sixty miles to the airport ♪
translation.zh: 这头60公里是最近的河 那头100公里是机场

translation.en: ♪ When we plan our escape That's where we're gonna have to be ♪
translation.zh: 当我们计划逃跑时 那就是我们得去的地方

translation.en: ♪ It's a shame, it's a sham It's a terrible pity ♪
translation.zh: 遗憾 扼腕 实在太可惜

translation.en: ♪ You got dragged away From New York City ♪
translation.zh: 你从纽约市被拖来了这里

translation.en: ♪ It's major suck for you But it's amazing luck for me ♪
translation.zh: 对你来说是倒了大霉 可对我来说却是天大的运气

translation.en: ♪ It's the lamest place in the world ♪
translation.zh: 这里是全世界最蹩脚的地方 （七月）

translation.en: ♪ And you're completely exotic ♪
translation.zh: 而你却充满了异域风情

translation.en: ♪ Intellectual, neurotic ♪
translation.zh: 神经质的头脑 聪明伶俐

translation.en: ♪ You would never have a shot ♪
translation.zh: 原本无法生存在这里的你

translation.en: ♪ Except you found the perfect guide ♪
translation.zh: 得亏找到了完美向导

translation.en: ♪ And though I don't really know you ♪
translation.zh: 尽管我还不怎么了解你

translation.en: ♪ I can hardly wait to show you ♪
translation.zh: 我却等不及要展示给你

translation.en: ♪ Every fake and freak Every fool and clown ♪
translation.zh: 每一个笨蛋与小丑 每一种假与怪

translation.en: ♪ Since the Chippewas settled This stupid town ♪
translation.zh: 自从奇佩瓦人定居到这个镇上以来

translation.en: ♪ Let 'em laugh, they won't keep me down ♪
translation.zh: 让别人笑去吧 他们无法将我阻挡

translation.en: ♪ With you by my side! ♪
translation.zh: 有你在我身旁

translation.en: ♪ And it just got a little bit better ♪
translation.zh: 它刚变好了一些些 （八月）

translation.en: ♪ Amazing but true ♪
translation.zh: 不可思议却又很真实

translation.en: ♪ Yes, the lamest place in the world Has lots of flaws ♪

translation.en: ♪ But maybe it'll be fine ♪
translation.zh: 但或许这也没关系

translation.en: ♪ Because it brought me ♪
translation.zh: 因为它将我带到了

translation.en: ♪ To you! ♪
translation.zh: 你身旁！

translation.zh: 妈妈 帕特里斯在等我呢 书 你的书呢？

translation.en: There are no books. It's the first day. It's just the first day.

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay.

translation.en: -[Evan wheezes] -[sighs] I am so proud of you.

translation.en: [strained voice] You're popping my lung. Okay.

translation.en: Hey!

translation.en: -[mouths] What? -Bro, what?

translation.en: Lucy!
translation.zh: 露西！

translation.en: You're totally into Brett.

translation.en: [chuckles] I did think about him all summer and…

translation.en: we would look good together and
translation.zh: 我俩看起来会很登对 而且…

translation.zh: -我们现在是初二生了 -是啊！

translation.en: Everyone's at camp having fun,

translation.en: and I'm doing Bible study and Latin and violin and science
translation.zh: 而我却在上查经班 学拉丁文、小提琴和科学

translation.en: while she picks out all my clothes and watches over everything I do.

translation.en: -[Lucy] Horrible! -[boy] KC!

translation.en: Kendra, yeah, can we chat a sec?

translation.zh: “要在一个黑暗而安静的浪漫之地”

translation.zh: 就是一个犹太人的玩意 他们会让你反过来讲话

translation.en: N-- No!

translation.en: It's a party. With dancing. And a DJ.

translation.en: It'll be awesome.

translation.en: Actually, my friend, Patrice, helped me plan it. [Lucy, scornfully] Patrice? That Patrice?

translation.en: Sign the petition for compostable cutlery.

translation.en: Do what's right. Not easy.

translation.en: -[boy] That was easy. -[laughter breaks out]

translation.en: [smugly] Yeah, maybe not.

translation.en: [Evan] She's good people. She, you know, just does her own thing. Patrice.

translation.en: No, she thinks she's better than everyone.
translation.zh: -帕特里斯 -不 她自以为高人一等

translation.en: Whatever, Lucy. Evan, can we talk?

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Evan] One second, guys. What is going on, Patrice?

translation.en: -That's who you wanna hang out with? -I dunno. They seem cool.

translation.en: Is that what you want? To be "cool"?

translation.en: -I want them to come to my party. -Why?

translation.en: Because it's my Bar Mitzvah.

translation.en: I need a great party. What's your problem with them?
translation.zh: 因为这是我的受诫礼 我必须有一个很棒的派对 你有什么意见啊？

translation.en: Any group that has room for Lucy Hallman is not a group that I need to be part of.

translation.en: -[mouthing] -[Evan] How about this?
translation.zh: 我爱你 要不这样吧？

translation.en: They come to my Bar Mitzvah, and you and me have our own party.
translation.zh: 他们来参加我的受诫礼 你跟我办自己的派对

translation.en: Just us.
translation.zh: 就我们俩

translation.en: Boom. Everyone's happy.

translation.en: You did not just say that.
translation.zh: 这种话你也说得出来

translation.en: Whatever's going on between you all, I can help fix it.

translation.en: Whatever. I don't even care.
translation.zh: 随便了 反正我也不在乎

translation.en: -Patrice, I… -[footsteps receding]

translation.en: Archie, what just happened?

translation.en: Middle school.

translation.en: Sometimes it helps just to puncture something.

translation.en: You don't have to help me.

translation.en: Jessica!

translation.en: and you are getting on every one of mine.

translation.en: Find something to do.

translation.en: That my son resents me for blowing up his life?

translation.en: Or that after putting my own life on hold so my husband could build up his law firm,
translation.zh: 还是写我是如何放下自己的人生 好让我丈夫打造他的律师事务所

translation.en: he betrays me, so our marriage implodes?
translation.zh: 结果他背叛了我 我们的婚姻就这样崩塌了？

translation.en: Or the kicker, I'm sleeping in the room where my mom keeps her orthopedic shoes
translation.zh: 要不来个最劲爆的 我睡在我妈放矫形鞋的房间里

translation.en: because just when I've stopped asking, "How can things get any worse,"
translation.zh: 因为正当我不再自问： “事情还能变得更糟糕吗？”

translation.en: I find myself starting completely over.
translation.zh: 却猛然发觉自己要重新开始了

translation.en: -That's what I should write about? -I'll clear off your father's old desk.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.zh: 别着急 有几件事先听我讲一讲

translation.en: ♪ First, it's dark, and it's scary So you'll wanna hug tight ♪
translation.zh: 那里黑漆漆的让人心慌 所以你们会想将彼此紧抱

translation.en: ♪ There are folks all around But they're not paying attention ♪
translation.zh: 虽然周围全是人 可根本没人会注意到

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause some wacko with an axe Is hacking everyone in sight ♪
translation.zh: 因为某个抡着斧子的疯子 见着人就砍倒

translation.en: ♪ So when you're in the market ♪
translation.zh: 所以如果你们要寻找

translation.en: ♪ For a thing that makes your heart Pump the blood faster ♪
translation.zh: 什么能让人心跳加速血脉喷张

translation.en: ♪ I suggest The Bloodmaster ♪
translation.zh: 我建议就选《血王》

translation.en: ♪ Friday night! ♪
translation.zh: 周五晚上！

translation.en: Friday night? This is awesome. What do you think, Kendra?
translation.zh: 周五晚上？棒极了 你觉得呢 肯德拉？

translation.en: ♪ Hold up, hold up Let me tell you where it's at ♪
translation.zh: 等一下 等一下 我来说说问题在哪里

translation.en: ♪ Kendra's mom'll never let her See a movie like that ♪
translation.zh: 让肯德拉看这种电影 她妈妈不可能同意

translation.en: ♪ And if she doesn't go Then I guess they can't do it ♪
translation.zh: 要是她去不了 他们的事就准没戏

translation.en: -I guess she's kinda right. -I'm always right.
translation.zh: -好吧 她说得有点道理 -我当然有道理

translation.en: ♪ Nothing to it, here's the deal Kendra never tells her mom ♪
translation.zh: 没什么大不了 我这儿有妙招 肯德拉不用告诉她妈

translation.en: ♪ That she's going to The Bloodmaster ♪
translation.zh: 她要去看《血王》

translation.en: What do I say?
translation.zh: 那我怎么说？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause for real, she'll be heading Home with Lucy after school that day ♪
translation.zh: 因为那天放学后 她会跟露西一起回家

translation.en: -My house? -Sleepover! Yay!
translation.zh: -我家？ -过夜！耶！

translation.en: ♪ At 6:45, Kendra Zooms with her mother ♪
translation.zh: 到了6点45 肯德拉跟她妈视频

translation.en: ♪ And she asks if it's okay To hang with Lucy all night ♪
translation.zh: 然后她就问一下 能不能在露西家玩一晚

translation.en: ♪ And at 7:05, Cassie's mom picks you up 'Cause everyone says Cassie's mom's cool ♪
translation.zh: 到了7点05 卡茜妈来接你 因为大家都知道 卡茜的妈最最酷

translation.en: ♪ That's right! ♪
translation.zh: 当然！

translation.en: ♪ And at 7:22, like a blizzard That's predicted by a forecaster ♪ ♪ Shoop shoop ♪
translation.zh: 而到了7点22 就像被预报员预测的暴风雪一场

translation.en: ♪ You drop into The Bloodmaster Friday ni-- ♪
translation.zh: 你们会降临在《血王》的现场 周五晚上…

translation.en: ♪ Hold up, hold up I don't know what you mean ♪
translation.zh: 等一下 等一下 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause they won't let us in Until we're 17 ♪
translation.zh: 因为影院才把我们放进去 除非我到了17岁

translation.en: ♪ So hold the applause And can the confetti ♪
translation.zh: 所以先别着急着鼓掌 五彩纸屑先收好

translation.en: ♪ I'm on it already! There's another movie playing ♪
translation.zh: 我早就想好了对策！ 还有另一部电影在放

translation.en: ♪ At the theater Where we're gonna see The Bloodmaster ♪
translation.zh: 在那我们看《血王》的剧场

translation.en: ♪ The Bloodmaster! ♪
translation.zh: 《血王》！

translation.en: ♪ So we just buy tickets To the little kiddie movie instead ♪
translation.zh: 所以我们只需要 买小朋友看的电影票

translation.en: ♪ Good luck, there's a manager Who doesn't miss a trick ♪
translation.zh: 祝你好运 谁也逃不过那儿的管理员

translation.en: ♪ It's not a problem If we all get the moves just right ♪
translation.zh: 没问题 只要我们把一切都协调好

translation.en: ♪ I'll create a distraction With the guy who's taking tickets ♪
translation.zh: 我会弄点动静出来 让检票的人分神

translation.en: ♪ And we duck into the theater While you block us from sight ♪
translation.zh: 我们在你的掩护下 成功地遛进电影院

translation.en: ♪ Then we're in! ♪
translation.zh: 我们进去了！

translation.en: ♪ Kendra gets to be the queen Brett gets to be the stud master! ♪
translation.zh: 肯德拉就能做皇后 布雷特就成了当天晚上的王！

translation.en: ♪ We're going to The Bloodmaster! ♪
translation.zh: 我们要去看《血王》！

translation.en: -♪ Friday night! ♪ -♪ We're going to The Bloodmaster! ♪
translation.zh: -周五晚上！ -我们要去看《血王》！

translation.en: ♪ We're going to The Bloodmaster! ♪
translation.zh: 我们要去看《血王》！

translation.en: ♪ This Friday night! ♪
translation.zh: 这个周五的晚上！

translation.en: Great job. It's gonna be so much fun.
translation.zh: -干得漂亮 -肯定会很好玩的

translation.en: -[boy] Sweet, Evan. -Walk with me.
translation.zh: 跟我走一段

translation.en: So, Evan Goldman, you figured it out! You're the hero.
translation.zh: 那么 埃文·高德曼 你想出了个好办法 你是大英雄啦

translation.en: Not really. I mean, a little maybe, but…
translation.zh: 哪里哪里 或许有一点吧 但…

translation.en: And it seems important that we all come to this party of yours because,
translation.zh: 我们都来参加你的派对 似乎对你很重要 但是呢…

translation.en: well, if there's a party and I tell people not to come…
translation.zh: 如果有那么一场派对 我叫大家不要去的话…

translation.en: there isn't a party.
translation.zh: 那就等于没有派对

translation.en: Why do I feel there's more to this chat than the one we're currently having?
translation.zh: 为什么我觉得你好像话里有话？

translation.en: Here's the problem. You need people at your party.
translation.zh: 说白一点 你需要大家来参加你的派对

translation.en: I need to make sure Brett and Kendra don't kiss at this movie on Friday,
translation.zh: 我需要确保布雷特和肯德拉 这周五不会在看电影的时候接吻

translation.en: which was your idea.
translation.zh: 这是你想出来的

translation.en: Why don't you want Brett and Kendra to k--
translation.zh: 你为什么不想让布雷特和肯德拉接…

translation.en: You see my dilemma.
translation.zh: 明白我的困境了吧

translation.en: Of course,
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Kendra's my best friend, and I could never hurt her, so…
translation.zh: 肯德拉是我最要好的朋友 我是绝不会伤害她的 所以…

translation.en: You help me, I help you. It's quid pro quo!
translation.zh: 你帮我一把 我也帮你一把 互相帮助嘛

translation.en: How am I supposed to stop them from getting together if they like each other?
translation.zh: 可如果他们互相喜欢 我又有什么办法阻止他们在一起啊？

translation.en: You're the guy with all the answers. You'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 你是无所不能的人 你会想到办法的

translation.en: Aw, I'm so glad we're friends. Aren't you?
translation.zh: 我真高兴能跟你做朋友 你不高兴吗？

translation.en: Bye!
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[Brett] Set!
translation.zh: 预备！

translation.en: [Kendra] All right, everyone, let's try this again. Ready, Lucy?
translation.zh: 好嘞 各位 我们再做一遍 大家同意吗？

translation.en: Five, six, seven…
translation.zh: 五、六、七…

translation.en: -Hey, Archie. How you doing? -Pretty good.
translation.zh: -嘿 阿奇 你好吗？ -挺好的

translation.en: I guess Patrice is still pretty mad at me, huh?
translation.zh: 看来帕特里斯还在生我的气 是吧？

translation.en: Well, you chose those guys over her. My guess is she hates you.
translation.zh: 你为了那帮家伙抛下了她 要我猜的话 她恨死你了

translation.en: [Kendra] Oh, let me grab my bag.
translation.zh: 我去把包拿来

translation.en: Oh! Cute shirt, Archie.
translation.zh: 衬衫真好看 阿奇

translation.en: Did you see that?
translation.zh: 你看到没？

translation.en: Way to play it cool, Arch.
translation.zh: 表现得真淡定啊 阿奇

translation.en: If I could have ten minutes sitting next to her,
translation.zh: 要是我能坐在她身旁 哪怕就十分

translation.en: I would know that I had not lived my life in vain.
translation.zh: 我这辈子就算没白活了

translation.en: -Does she know you like her? -Oh.
translation.zh: 她知道你喜欢她吗？

translation.en: I think she misinterpreted my flirting for food poisoning.
translation.zh: 我觉得她好像误把我的调情 当成了食物中毒

translation.en: Of course, in her defense, I did throw up after.
translation.zh: 当然了 也不能怪她 毕竟我说完话就吐了

translation.en: What if I told you I had a way for you to sit next to Kendra for two hours?
translation.zh: 阿奇 要是我告诉你我有办法 让你在肯德拉身旁坐两小时呢？

translation.en: Next to her in the same building?
translation.zh: 在她身旁？同一屋檐下？

translation.en: Next to her in the next seat at the movies on Friday.
translation.zh: 就坐在她旁边的座位 周五看电影的时候

translation.en: Don't toy with me.
translation.zh: 千万别耍我

translation.en: Here's the thing. Lucy is holding my party hostage
translation.zh: 事情是这样的 露西拿我的派对威胁我

translation.en: unless I stop Brett and Kendra from kissing.
translation.zh: 要我阻止布雷特和肯德拉接吻

translation.en: Okay, I'm listening.
translation.zh: 好吧 我有兴趣

translation.en: All right, it's pretty complicated, but hear me out.
translation.zh: 好嘞 计划挺复杂的 但听我细细道来

translation.en: What if you sit on the other side of Kendra--
translation.zh: 如果安排你坐到肯德拉的另一边…

translation.en: -I'm in! -There's more.
translation.zh: -我同意 -还没说完呢

translation.en: Okay, keep going.
translation.zh: 好吧 继续说

translation.en: Then, at the perfect moment, you faint on Kendra's shoulder,
translation.zh: 然后 就在那一刻要来的时候 你晕倒在肯德拉的肩膀上

translation.en: drawing her attention and blocking Brett from kissing her.
translation.zh: 吸引她的注意 阻止布雷特吻她

translation.en: Oh! And I get to kiss Kendra instead.
translation.zh: 然后我就能吻肯德拉了

translation.en: What? No. The plan is,
translation.zh: 什么？不 计划是

translation.en: you make a scene and block the kiss, and no one will get mad at you because--
translation.zh: 你演一场戏阻止那一吻 而且不可能有人会生你的气 因为…

translation.en: Because I'm charming.
translation.zh: 因为我很讨人喜欢

translation.en: Yeah, that.
translation.zh: 嗯 正是

translation.en: Lucy gets what she wants, and everyone comes to my party.
translation.zh: 露西能如愿以偿 这样大家都会来参加我的派对了

translation.en: And I get to kiss Kendra.
translation.zh: 而且我还能吻到肯德拉

translation.en: You keep saying that as though it's part of the plan.
translation.zh: 你一直这么说 就好像这是计划中的一部分似的

translation.en: It's not.
translation.zh: 并不是

translation.en: You saved all my old journals?
translation.zh: 你把我所有的旧日记都保留了下来？

translation.en: I thought I told you to throw out all my old stuff?
translation.zh: 我不是告诉过你 把我所有的旧东西都扔掉吗？

translation.en: When did you say that?
translation.zh: 你啥时候这么说的？

translation.en: When I left home and said, "Throw out all my old stuff."
translation.zh: 我离开家的时候 我说： “把我所有的旧东西都扔掉”

translation.en: -Oh! Jess. -Mom.
translation.zh: -杰茜啊 -妈

translation.en: Jess. [sighs]
translation.zh: 杰茜

translation.en: -You know what I miss? -Subtlety? [sighs]
translation.zh: -你知道我想念什么吗？ -委婉？

translation.en: Teaching.
translation.zh: 教书

translation.en: It gave me purpose.
translation.zh: 它赋予了我人生意义

translation.en: You were really good at it.
translation.zh: 你教得非常好

translation.en: You went to college, worked harder than anyone, and earned your BFA.
translation.zh: 你去上了大学 比任何人都刻苦 拿到了你的本科学位

translation.en: You were a writer. That was your purpose.
translation.zh: 你以前是个作家 那才是你人生的意义

translation.en: And if it took a divorce to light a fire under your tuchus,
translation.zh: 如果需要一场离婚 才能逼你行动起来的话

translation.en: maybe that's a good thing.
translation.zh: 或许这是一件好事呢

translation.en: -I'm just saying, again. -[Jessica sighs].
translation.zh: 我只是建议啊

translation.en: I'm gonna get some stuff then I'm gonna hang out with Archie.
translation.zh: 我去拿点东西 然后就去跟阿奇玩

translation.en: No, wait-- Oh no-- We're supposed to have dinner together.
translation.zh: 不 等等 不是说好一起吃晚饭的吗？

translation.en: And you have a Hebrew lesson.
translation.zh: 而且你还得上希伯来语课

translation.en: -I'll reschedule it for tomorrow. -No-- Evan. Whoa, whoa, whoa. Come back.
translation.zh: -我会改到明天的 -不 埃文 回来

translation.en: You have blown us off every night. You won't answer your father's calls.
translation.zh: 你每晚都放我们鸽子 也不肯接你爸的电话

translation.en: You haven't talked to me about your Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 你到现在都没跟我聊过 你受诫礼有什么打算

translation.en: And now, skipping lessons?
translation.zh: 而且现在都学会逃课了？

translation.en: -What is going on? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -到底怎么回事？ -没什么啊

translation.en: You wanted to move here and for me to make new friends,
translation.zh: 是你想让我搬来这里 想让我交新朋友的

translation.en: so here I am, making new friends.
translation.zh: 我这不是在交新朋友吗？

translation.en: -At least I'm trying. -Look, this is about you.
translation.zh: -至少我在努力 你呢？ -听着 我们在说你呢

translation.en: You will do your lesson with the rabbi, and then you will see your friends.
translation.zh: 你必须要跟拉比上课 上完课再见你的朋友们去

translation.en: You're his mother.
translation.zh: 你是他妈妈

translation.en: He's watching what you do.
translation.zh: 你做什么 他都看在眼里

translation.en: -That's all I've got to say. -[quietly] Yeah.
translation.zh: 我话就说到这里

translation.en: I doubt that.
translation.zh: 我严重怀疑

translation.en: Archie! Archie!
translation.zh: 阿奇！

translation.en: -I can't talk right now. -[Patrice] Do you wanna come for dinner?
translation.zh: -我现在不方便说话 帕特里斯 -你要不要来一起吃晚饭啊？

translation.en: I've got a whole list of movies where Americans do bad English accents.
translation.zh: 我准备了一个电影列表 里面全是美国人拙劣地模仿英国口音

translation.en: All right, fine, you broke me. We're all going to The Bloodmaster.
translation.zh: 好吧 我坦白 我们要一起去看《血王》了

translation.en: Evan made a plan where I block Brett from kissing Kendra
translation.zh: 埃文想了个计划 让我阻止布雷特吻肯德拉

translation.en: so Lucy will bring everyone to his party.
translation.zh: 这样露西就会带大家 来参加他的派对了

translation.en: Wait, Evan is using you just to save his party?
translation.zh: 等等 埃文这样利用你 就为了拯救自己的派对？

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm good with that.
translation.zh: 是啊 而且我没意见

translation.en: -This is wrong, Archie. -[Archie] Stay out of it, Patrice.
translation.zh: 这样做不对 阿奇 别插手 帕特里斯

translation.en: I like what you're doing, but think about--
translation.zh: 我觉得你表现得不错 但仔细想一想…

translation.en: And this could just be fun--
translation.zh: 这可能会很好玩的

translation.en: Just… not getting the beit and the kaf confused.
translation.zh: 努力别把“贝特”和“卡夫”搞混了

translation.en: Except, they're confusing.
translation.zh: 可是它们太容易搞混了

translation.en: [sarcastically] Hmm. You find a 6,000-year-old language confusing. Now I see the problem.
translation.zh: 你觉得一门有六千年历史的语言难懂 我明白问题在哪里了

translation.en: You thought this would be easy. That just-- That's just bad intel.
translation.zh: 你以为学这个会很容易 那是你消息不灵通

translation.en: I'm sorry, there's something important I need to do.
translation.zh: 拉比 对不起 我有件很重要的事要做

translation.en: More important than your Bar Mitzvah?
translation.zh: 比你的受诫礼还重要吗？

translation.en: One moment.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: God, [laughs] you're gonna love this. No, it's Goldman again.
translation.zh: 上帝 你肯定会笑死的 对 又是高德曼

translation.en: Really, Rabbi, trust me. This can't wait.
translation.zh: 真的 拉比 相信我 这件事等不了

translation.en: You want me to go full rabbi on you? I'm gonna go-- I'm gonna do it.
translation.zh: 你想让我搬出拉比那一套来吗？ 我真会…我会动真格的哦

translation.en: I'm gonna go full rabbi. Kippah coming on. Boom.
translation.zh: 我要拿出拉比的样子来了 要戴圆顶小帽了 砰

translation.en: [whispers] Respect. Respect the yarmulke.
translation.zh: 尊重 对圆顶小帽放尊重点

translation.en: Look, I'm not here to tell you what you should or shouldn't do, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 埃文 我不是要告诉你该做什么 不该做什么

translation.en: You gotta find your own way. I just…
translation.zh: 好吗 你的路要靠自己找 我只是…

translation.en: I've just walked a few more steps than you,
translation.zh: 我只是比你多走了几步而已

translation.en: and maybe I can help you stumble a few less than I did.
translation.zh: 或许我能帮助你少跌几跤 不要像我以前一样

translation.en: Really, I'm not avoiding my lesson.
translation.zh: 真的 我不是要逃课

translation.en: It's your choice. But listen to this, okay?
translation.zh: 选择权在你手上 但听我说一句 好吗？

translation.en: Look, how you do one thing is how you do everything,
translation.zh: 听说 你做一件事的方式 决定了你怎么做所有事

translation.en: and what you're not doing is learning your haftorah.
translation.zh: 而你不在做的事 就是好好学哈夫塔拉

translation.en: Seriously. It's not even Hebrew. You sound like an injured dolphin.
translation.zh: 说真的 根本都不能算希伯来语 你听上去就像是只受了伤的海豚

translation.en: [high voice] Really? Oh.
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: We'll talk soon.
translation.zh: 我们回头再聊

translation.en: Peace out, Flipper.
translation.zh: 闪了 小海豚

translation.en: ♪ Only got one shot Better get it right ♪
translation.zh: 机会只有一次 失手千万不要

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready ♪
translation.zh: 我在做准备

translation.en: ♪ Gotta look real hot 'Cause it's Friday night ♪
translation.zh: 必须得够帅气 周五晚马上到

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready! ♪
translation.zh: 我在做准备

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready today I'm getting ready to say ♪
translation.zh: 我在为今天准备 准备这样说

translation.en: ♪ "I'm not that weird geek You think I must be" ♪
translation.zh: “我一点也不怪 不是你以为的阿呆”

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready to move I'm getting ready to prove ♪
translation.zh: 我准备要行动 我准备要证明

translation.en: ♪ Kendra just needs a love god like me ♪
translation.zh: 肯德拉需要我这样的爱神

translation.en: ♪ Big night tonight Then everyone comes to my Bar Mitzvah ♪
translation.zh: 今晚很重要 大家都会来参加我的受诫礼

translation.en: ♪ Gotta wear a tie ♪
translation.zh: 领带要系好

translation.en: ♪ If this goes right Then everyone comes to my Bar Mitzvah ♪
translation.zh: 要是执行好 大家都会来参加我的受诫礼

translation.en: ♪ Gotta zip my fly ♪
translation.zh: 拉链要拉牢

translation.en: ♪ If we can get in And Brett's ready for action ♪
translation.zh: 要是能顺利溜进 布雷特准备要行动

translation.en: ♪ But Kendra's distracted By Archie's distraction ♪
translation.zh: 但肯德拉分了心 阿奇的表演起作用

translation.en: ♪ So they never kiss Lucy gets satisfaction ♪
translation.zh: 达到露西的目的 让他们接吻不成功

translation.en: -♪ And everyone comes to my party ♪ -♪ So I'm getting ready, it's true ♪
translation.zh: -那大家就都会来参加我的派对 -我在做准备 没错

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready to do ♪
translation.zh: 我在做准备 去做

translation.en: -♪ Something that makes them ♪ -♪ Something that makes her ♪
translation.zh: -做完后他们终于会 -做完后她终于会

translation.en: ♪ Accept me at last ♪
translation.zh: -做完后他们终于会 -做完后她终于会 接受我

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready, all right ♪
translation.zh: 我在做准备 一整晚

translation.en: ♪ Nothing can stop me tonight ♪
translation.zh: 无人能阻挡 就今晚

translation.en: ♪ I'm getting ready ♪
translation.zh: 我在做准备

translation.en: ♪ Ready ♪
translation.zh: 准备

translation.en: ♪ Ready ♪
translation.zh: 准备

translation.en: ♪ Now! ♪

translation.en: -Hey, Kendra. -Hey.
translation.zh: -姐妹 我可不喜欢恐怖电影！ -嘿 肯德拉 嘿

translation.en: Mission Popcorn Pileup accomplished.
translation.zh: “爆米花洒一地”行动 完成

translation.en: -Thank you. -[girl] Great job, Evan.

translation.en: [Malcolm] I can't believe you pulled this off.
translation.zh: -干得好 埃文 -我都不敢相信你竟然成功了

translation.en: This better work. Or you'll be lighting that birthday menorah alone.

translation.en: That's Hanukkah.
translation.zh: 那是光明节

translation.en: Heidi, so cool that your cousin, who escaped prison,
translation.zh: 海蒂 你那个逃犯表哥竟然允许我们

translation.en: let us use his cabin here in the isolated mountains. -[Heidi giggles] -[keys jangle]

translation.en: [Heidi] Look, there's blood everywhere.

translation.en: [Heidi] He said he was going to look for some tools in the toolshed.
translation.zh: 他说他要去工具房里找工具的

translation.en: Yo, there you are. I was worried that you were--
translation.zh: 哟 你在这里啊 我还在担心你是不是…

translation.en: -I'll never sleep again! -This is awesome!
translation.zh: -我再也睡不着了！ -这也太精彩了吧！

translation.en: We have to run.
translation.zh: 我们必须得逃了

translation.en: Let's split up.
translation.zh: 我们分头行动吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对头

translation.en: They--
translation.zh: 他们…

translation.en: Get off!

translation.en: Kurt, if we're about to be cut into pieces,
translation.zh: 柯特 如果我们马上就要被砍成碎片的话

translation.en: then let's have one last kiss.
translation.zh: 那我们就给彼此最后一吻吧

translation.en: Oh! He's going in.
translation.zh: 他要行动了

translation.en: This is on.
translation.zh: 好戏来了

translation.en: -[Mrs. Duncan] Kendra Duncan! -[Evan] Oh my God.
translation.zh: -肯德拉·邓肯！ -我的天啊

translation.en: -Mom?! -[woman] Cassie Connor!

translation.en: Everyone under the age of 17, out!
translation.zh: 所有17岁以下的人 都出去！

translation.en: -[KC] How'd you find out? -Who did this?

translation.en: [Jessica] Evan Goldman!
translation.zh: -是谁说出去的？ -埃文·高德曼！

translation.en: -[Evan] Huh? -[Charlotte] Evan? Seriously?

translation.en: [Brett] Goldman?

translation.en: Evan, you said I could kiss Kendra.

translation.en: -What? -No!

translation.en: [laughing] Evan, what did you do?

translation.en: [Brett] Dude, why would you do this?

translation.en: No way we're coming to your party now.
translation.zh: 这下我们会去你的派对才怪！

translation.en: -Come on. -[boy] What is going on?

translation.en: No, no, no! No!
translation.zh: 不！不要啊！

translation.en: [manager] Have you seen the poster for it? It's just made of blood!
translation.zh: 这样做不对 制定这些规则是有原因的

translation.en: Get up.
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry. I just wanted to have some fun for once.
translation.zh: 对不起 我只是想做一回有趣的事 做些我想做的事

translation.en: Do something I wanted.
translation.zh: 我只是想做一回有趣的事 做些我想做的事

translation.en: I trusted you, and this is what happens.
translation.zh: 我这么信任你 结果就这样

translation.en: Kendra!
translation.zh: 肯德拉！

translation.en: Stay away from my daughter. Go.

translation.en: I can't believe you all did this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你们一起做这种事

translation.en: Archie, are you okay?
translation.zh: 阿奇 你没事吧？

translation.en: Okay? You messed up my one chance to kiss Kendra.

translation.en: I was just trying to help you.
translation.zh: 我只是想帮你

translation.en: Okay, why does everyone think I need help?
translation.zh: 好吧 为什么所有人都觉得我需要帮助？

translation.en: I have my own parking space, my own bathroom, the best ride in town.
translation.zh: 我有自己专属的停车位 我自己专属的厕所 全镇最棒的座驾

translation.en: I'm great.
translation.zh: 我不用别人帮

translation.en: You two clearly need more help than I do.

translation.en: I can't believe you told.

translation.en: You were using Archie just so people would come to your party.

translation.en: Or maybe you purposely wanted tonight to fail so no one would come to my party.

translation.en: You took advantage of my friend. It's not me that ruined everything.

translation.en: Archie, wait up.

translation.en: [Lucy] Are you okay?

translation.en: [Brett] No.

translation.en: I was about to kiss Kendra.

translation.en: Yeah, but…

translation.en: Do you think she really would have gone through with it?

translation.en: Yeah, she was--

translation.en: I mean, she was worried her mom would get furious.

translation.en: Maybe she wouldn't have.

translation.en: Really?

translation.en: [muted] I can't believe this. I trusted you…

translation.en: Maybe you've been waiting all summer for someone who isn't ready for you,

translation.en: instead of someone who is, you know,
translation.zh: 或许有其他人…你知道的

translation.en: ready for an opportunity like this.

translation.en: Let's get out of here, boyfriend.

translation.en: Remember what it felt like to sit on that bed when you messed up.

translation.en: Hut!

translation.en: What? I'm on the field.

translation.en: What? When I'm on the field? That doesn't make sense.

translation.en: -I was just saying hi. -Oh, so you're saying she's hot.

translation.en: No, I mean, she's… nice. Oh, so I'm not nice?

translation.en: -What? I never said that. -Oh, so now I'm a liar!

translation.en: -♪ Are we mean? ♪ -♪ Are we rude? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Yeah! ♪

translation.en: -♪ That girl is bad, bad news, bad news ♪ -♪ Yahoo! She's so bad, yeah ♪

translation.en: ♪ She took our pal, she took our leader And led him astray ♪

translation.en: ♪ She's totally bad, bad news Bad news ♪

translation.en: ♪ Bad news ♪

translation.en: ♪ Listen up, Brett You're not ruined yet ♪ ♪ We'll show you the way ♪

translation.en: ♪ Get away from that noise And come back to your boys ♪

translation.en: ♪ Even though she has excellent shoes ♪

translation.en: ♪ She's bad, bad, bad, bad ♪

translation.en: ♪ Bad, bad, bad, bad ♪
translation.zh: 坏…

translation.en: ♪ News! ♪
translation.zh: 消息！

translation.en: ♪ Bad news! ♪

translation.en: I just wanted to make friends.
translation.zh: 我只是想交朋友而已

translation.en: I just wanted something to go right.
translation.zh: 我只是想能有一件称心如意的事

translation.en: I know it hasn't been easy.

translation.en: -Now everyone thinks I'm a loser. -Nobody thinks you're a loser.
translation.zh: -现在大家都觉得我是个失败者 -没人觉得你是个失败者

translation.en: "You're a loser."
translation.zh: “你是个失败者”

translation.en: Okay!
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Things are going really great for us, huh?

translation.en: You and me.
translation.zh: 你跟我

translation.en: ♪ Kid from the city Steps up to the plate ♪

translation.en: ♪ He's got one at-bat To determine his fate ♪

translation.en: ♪ And so he takes a big swing With remarkable grace ♪
translation.zh: 于是他气定神闲地奋力一挥

translation.en: ♪ And the ball Hits him right in the face ♪
translation.zh: 而球却打了他一脸的灰

translation.en: ♪ It would be funny if it didn't suck ♪ ♪ If it didn't hurt ♪
translation.zh: 要是没那么痛 没那么不爽 可能我还笑得出来

translation.en: ♪ If it wasn't the end of the world ♪

translation.en: ♪ It was over before I started ♪

translation.en: ♪ And nothing's gonna fix it now ♪

translation.en: ♪ "I'm gonna set New York on fire And I'm not coming back" ♪

translation.en: ♪ Except I guess I never got around To lighting that torch ♪

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm back On my mother's front porch ♪
translation.zh: 因为我又回到了我妈妈的前院

translation.en: ♪ It would be funny if it didn't suck If it wasn't me ♪
translation.zh: 如果没这么不爽 不是发生在我身上 这可能会让我笑出声来

translation.en: ♪ But nothing's gonna fix it now ♪

translation.en: ♪ Nobody wants to hear ♪

translation.en: ♪ How failing's The only way you can learn ♪

translation.en: ♪ Doesn't matter If you don't know the rules ♪
translation.zh: 你不喜欢这套规则 不喜欢这场游戏

translation.en: ♪ Or you don't like the game ♪
translation.zh: 那也没办法

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause you find out What you're made of ♪

translation.en: ♪ When you face What you're most afraid of ♪

translation.en: ♪ Like, what if you threw a party ♪

translation.en: ♪ And nobody came? ♪
translation.zh: 结果却没有人来
